document.full_text: the los angeles lakers came alive following their disappointing playoff opener to grind out an 87-78 victory over the new orleans hornets on wednesday and level their best-of-seven series 1-1.
document.title: lakers and spurs even series 1-1, thunder up 2-0
lines_and_colors: the los angeles lakers came alive following their disappointing playoff opener to grind out an 87-78 victory over the new orleans hornets on wednesday and level their best-of-seven series 1-1.
